<snip>
>Also, there was one mistake in your post. Not certain if it warrants
>posting a correction to the thread. You listed Lullaby as the level 16
>song. Its the level 15 song. Level 16 is the underwater breathing song.
>I would hope Verant knew you were talking about the level 15 song but you
>never know.

New response from Verant:

Extensive in-house testing has revealed that the 16th bard song, Tarew's
Aquatic Ayre, is working exactly as designed. This thread is now closed.
Thank you, have a nice day.

= )

Aloro Silvertongue
Jokester at large
